manufacturer.docs:
**string**: The name of the manufacturer/firmware creator. Defaults to `ESPHome`.

*See also: [BLE Server](https://esphome.io/components/esp32_ble_server.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
**string**: The model name of the device. Defaults to the friendly name of the `board` chosen in the [core configuration](https://esphome.io/components/esphome.html#esphome-configuration-variables).

*See also: [BLE Server](https://esphome.io/components/esp32_ble_server.html#configuration-variables)*
